description: This pesto recipe is easy to whip up and use throughout the week for various meals. Spread it on toast for breakfast, use it as a dip for snacks or heat as a sauce for pesto pasta at dinner.
keywords: Pesto,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Egg free,Video,Low sugar,Sesame free,Halal,High protein,High fibre,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Basic Pesto Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place all ingredients (except oil) in a food processor and blitz until resembles chunky consistency. Season well with salt and pepper, then add oil and blitz to combine. Use straight away, or place in a jar and store in the fridge for up to two weeks (add a little oil to the surface of the pesto to keep it fresh for longer).
